Concept comparison (meaning)¶

Functions¶

parse_gloss(gloss[, output]) Parse a gloss into its constituents by applying some general logic.
compare_concepts(c1, c2) Debug-function for concept comparison.
compare_conceptlists(list1, list2[, output, ...]) Function compares two concept lists and outputs suggestions for mapping.
colexification_network(wordlist[, entry, ...]) Calculate a colexification network from a given wordlist object.

Classes¶

BasVoc([infile, col, row, conf]) Load a comparative collection of Swadesh lists (concepticon).
